abstract.t: EVPN supports All-Active and Single-Active multihoming, where either all multihoming PEs are active or only one is active. In some situations, it is desired to support Multi-Active with multiple yet not all active PEs. This document specifies the Multi-Active multihoming - some multihoming PEs are in All-Active mode while others are in Single-Active mode on the same multihoming Ethernet Segment, and ingress PEs load-balance to those in All-Active mode.
